Subjects must willing refrain caffeine xanthene containing product ( chocolate ) prior dose 72 hour dose . Subjects must agree refrain strenuous exercise prior admission final visit . Subjects must refrain use alcohol start 7 day prior admission final visit . Subjects must agree donate blood product duration study participation . Subjects previously receive AG348 .
